argument.description: The number of times to repeat the string.

description: The PostgreSQL repeat function repeats a string a specified number of times.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT repeat('techonthenet.com', 2);
              repeat
------------------------------------
 'techonthenet.comtechonthenet.com'
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT repeat('A', 2);
 repeat
--------
 'AA'
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT repeat('a', 5);
 repeat
---------
 'aaaaa'
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT repeat(' ', 6);
 repeat
--------
 '      '
(1 row)
